name: Beanie Babies A-Z Quiz Series - A  | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is the name of the Las Vegas Exclusive bear?
questions.explanation:
Aces.

	Aces is a red bear that holds a sign for Las Vegas.  The sign says "Welcome to Fabulous Las Vegas Nevada."  Fabulous is written in cursive, the rest in print. "When in Vegas you have a shotTo try to win a big jackpotWhether or not you like to playWith me it's still your lucky day!"

questions.text: Which of the following is a blue bear with a baseball on the left side of her chest?
questions.explanation:
Addison.

	Addison is a baseball exclusive bear.  The fabric used is unique to most bears, as her fabric is a very soft fabric, not the regular fabric used. "In the bleachers we see allHope we'll catch a long fly ballWhen the day is finally doneHopefully, our team has won!"

questions.text: Which bear is a Hawaiian bear?
questions.explanation:
Alana.

	Alana the bear wears a grass skirt, common in Hawaii, and used in a dance called the hula.  She also has a lei, which is a flower necklace, made of orange and red flowers.  There is also one orange and red flower in her left ear. "The ocean air so fresh and cleanSome of the best sights to be seenWith sun and sand and mountains, tooThe best wonders of nature you can view!"

questions.text: Which of the following is a duck?
questions.explanation:
Allegro.

	Allegro is a ballerina duck.  She wears a pink tutu with a flower on the chest, and has a bow in her hair. "I love things that are frou-frouEspecially my pink tutuWith pretty shoes upon my feetI'll dance the Nutcracker Suite!"

questions.text: Which of the following is an eagle?
questions.explanation:
American.

	American the eagle is made to look like a flag.  He has a white head, and a red body with white spots.  His wings are blue, with white on the tips. "A symbol for this land so freeI proudly stand for all to seeAnd since the U.S. first beganI'm glad I'm an American!"

questions.text: Which of the following is a Mexican dog?
questions.explanation:
Amigo.

	Amigo means friend in Spanish.  Amigo the dog is a chihuahua, and wears a red collar, similar to many other Beanie Babies' collars. "I'm always loyal and so trueAnd I'll be there to talk to youSomeone on whom you can dependForever yours, the best of friends!"

questions.text: What type of animal is Arabesque?
questions.explanation:
Lamb.

	Arabesque is related to Allegro, the ballerina duck.  Arabesque, however, is a ballerina lamb.  Her tutu, unlike Allegro's pink tutu, is purple. "The curtain lifts and I beginI'll leap and twirl, balance and spinAnd when the crowd all cheers out loudMy family will be so proud!"

questions.text: Which Beanie Baby is a multicolored fish?
questions.explanation:
Aruba.

	Aruba is an angel fish of many colors.  She has green and pink fins and a purple tail, and has puckered lips to kiss you with. "If you wander by the seaAnd want to take a look at meI'm swimming in the water blueAnd want to throw a kiss to you!"

questions.text: Which of these is a polar bear with an open mouth?
questions.explanation:
Aurora.

	Aurora is a bear unlike most other bears.  She sits on her bottom, but is shaped more like Sarge the Beanie Baby, with her arms in front of her, not next to her. "The midnight sun puts on a showFor all the polar bears belowUnder ribbons of shining lightAurora hugs you and says goodnight!"

questions.text: Which of these is a pink bear?
questions.explanation:
Awareness.

	Awareness, along with her partner, Aware, are special Beanie Babies to raise awareness of breast cancer.  They both wear the famous pink ribbon on their chest.  Aware is a dark pink bear, and Awareness is a light pink bear with a softer fabric. Awareness: "Mothers, sisters, daughters, wivesThe special women in our livesLet's all join hands and do what's rightFor them, let's try to win this fight!" Aware: "To raise awareness is my plightHand in hand we'll stand and fightKeep the faith, we will endureRest assured, we'll find a cure!"
